count.description: The displayed number is displayed as ${overflowCount}+ when it is greater than overflowCount, and is hidden when it is 0 and show-zero is false
count.description_zh: 展示的数字，大于 overflowCount 时显示为 ${overflowCount}+，为0且show-zero为false时隐藏

is-dot.description: No numbers are shown, just a small dot
is-dot.description_zh: 不展示数字，只有一个小点

absolute.description: The offset parameter is valid only when the component is absolutely positioned
absolute.description_zh: 组件是否绝对定位，为true时，offset参数才有效

show-zero.description: When the value is 0, whether to display the badge
show-zero.description_zh: 当数值为 0 时，是否展示 Badge

size.description: Badge size, set to mini will get a smaller badge
size.description_zh: Badge的尺寸，设为mini会得到小一号的Badge

offset.description: Set the position offset of the badge in the format [x, y], that is, set the values of top and right, in rpx. Valid when absolute is true
offset.description_zh: 设置badge的位置偏移，格式为 [x, y]，也即设置的为top和right的值，单位rpx。absolute为true时有效

bgColor.description: If the background color has a higher priority than the type, if you set it, the type parameter will be invalid
bgColor.description_zh: 背景颜色，优先级比type高，如设置，type参数会失效

is-center.description: If the center point of the component coincides with the upper right corner of the parent component, the priority is higher than that of offset
is-center.description_zh: 组件中心点是否和父组件右上角重合，优先级比offset高，如设置，offset参数会失效

events.name: click
events.description: Triggered when you click on the cell list
